requirements.description: Do not pass personally identifiable information to Google, except as permitted by Google Analytics policies and with proper hashing.
Have and follow an appropriate Privacy Policy that complies with all relevant laws and regulations.
Post a Privacy Policy that informs users about the use of cookies, mobile device identifiers, and similar technologies for data collection.
Clearly disclose the use of Google Analytics and how it collects and processes data, including a link to Google's privacy policy for partners.
Ensure users are informed and consent to the storage and access of cookies or other information on their devices, if required by law.

type.summary: User Consent for Data Storage and Access
